import React from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; import logo from '../../images/dp_logo_color.svg' import ContactForm from '../ContactForm/ContactForm'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Section from '../Section/Section'; import { Blob } from 'react-blob' import './Home.css'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; export default function Home() { useEffect(() => { const anchor = window.location.href // Check if there is a hash and if an element with that id exists const el = anchor && document.getElementById(anchor.split('#')[1]) if (el) { el.scrollIntoView({behavior: "smooth"}) } }, [window.location.href]) // Fires every time hash changes return ( <>
{/* this is the first section with logo and description*/}

Decentralized People is the union of independent developers formed to collaborate on the projects that bring positive changes to the global society

{/* this is the second section with the project button and description */}

Let us introduce the projects we've been working on

Projects
{/* this is the third section with the developer button and description */}
Developers

And of course each project has people behind

{/* this will be the form to join */}
